æ¯”å¦‚å¢åŠ ä¸€ç§ç±»å‹ä¸º jsonString çš„éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™ï¼Œé™å®šå…¥å‚å¿…éœ€ä¸ºåˆæ³•çš„ JSON æ•°æ®ã€‚

app.ts

export default (app) => {
    app.validator.addRule('jsonString', (_rule, value) => {
        try {
            JSON.parse(value);
        } catch (err) {
            return 'must be json string';
        }
    });
};
